Task ID:
\h(《Vyse》)There's no point in resisting. Throw down your 
weapons and hand over your ship.\e

\h(《Valuan Soldier》)Imbeciles!
What do the two of you think you can do against
the five of us? Take 'em out.\e
\h(《Dyne》)I think you miscounted. I only see four of you.\e

\h(《Dyne》)We'll take care of these guys. Make your way to 
the bridge and shut down the engines.\e

\h(《Dyne》)And, when we're out here, remember, it's 
“Captain” …not “Dad.” Got it?\e

\h(《Vyse》)Yeah, yeah… Aye aye, “Captain.”
Heh… Aika, shall we go introduce ourselves to 
the captain of this ship?\e
